page.title: 06BREDON HILL
page.content: When it is cold and snowy we go sledg- ing down the hill.{Bredon Hill}has plenty of woods and we make dens in them.It is great fun.A lot of our friends go riding at John Hagley's Riding Stables.He takes them up the hill.If you are quiet you can see a lot of animals and birds.Some of my friends go bird watching.On top of Bredon Hill there are a lot of disused quarries.There is a tarmac road and my friends and l go roller skating down the road.Some of our dads work on top of the hill and we sometimes go and watch them.Sometimes we climb up the trees and make tree dens.Some of the trees are easy to climb and some are hard.We sometimes go up the hill and play Hide and Seek in the woods.We think Bredon Hill is a good place to play.We have seen foxes,badgers,deer, owls ,squirrels,rabbits,hares etc.
